snippet: The pop violinist Vanessa-Mae plans to file an appeal against her four-year ban from competitive skiing.
abstract: Thai pop violinist Vanessa-Mae plans to file appeal against four-year ban from competitive skiing levied by the International Ski Federation, which asserts that four giant-slalom races in Slovenia were fixed to allow her to qualify for Sochi Olympic Games.
lead_paragraph: The pop violinist Vanessa-Mae plans to file an appeal against her four-year ban from competitive skiing.
